fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will execute your targets if they are each part of a different group.
- Your first group includes all Town roles and all Neutral Benign roles.
- Your second group includes all non-Town and all non-Neutral Benign roles.
- You ignore framing of any kind.
- You may only judge players three times.
- You cannot judge any players until night three.
- You cannot judge players if you attempted to do so the previous night.
- If one of your targets is protected when you successfully find two players to kill, you will not kill the other target.
- When you achieve your goal, you will no longer be able to kill anyone, and you will no longer have Basic defense.
- Control and Detection Immunity
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**.
